Name: Native American myopathy
Definition: A neuromuscular disease characterized by congenital weakness

Name: Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease
Definition: A neuromuscular disease that is characterized by a slowly progressive degeneration of the muscles of the foot

Name: obsolete gonococcal meningitis
Definition: A neuromuscular disease that is characterized by a slowly progressive degeneration of the muscles of the foot

Name: neuromuscular junction disease
Definition: A neuromuscular disease that is characterized by the disfunction of conduction through the neuromuscular junction.
Synonym: peripheral Neuroectodermal tumor of soft tissues

Name: obsolete Henipavirus infectious disease
Definition: A Paramyxoviridae infectious disease that results_in infection in domestic animals and humans
Synonym: peripheral Neuroectodermal tumor of soft tissues

Name: atrophic muscular disease
Definition: A neuromuscular disease that is characterized by an abnormal reduction in the muscle volume and atrophy.

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's lymphoma
Definition: A neuromuscular disease that is characterized by an abnormal reduction in the muscle volume and atrophy.
